channel.title: Week 10: Accelerators & GPUs on PSU Astro 528
channel.description: Recent content in Week 10: Accelerators & GPUs on PSU Astro 528

item.title: Learning goals
item.description: Week 10 Project Gain experience parallelizing a real world code Identify changes need to acheive significant performance benefit via parallelization Readings / Discussions Describe how GPU differs from CPU Assess the prospects for a given algorithm to acheive a significant speed-up using a GPU
